questionTitle: I make three hundred __________________ euros a week.
Hundred __________________ of people died in the World War II.
The good new __________________ is that September will be sunny.
I can't hear you, there's too much noise __________________ here.
My friend helped me choose the furniture __________________ for my house.
She had her hair __________________ cut for her birthday.
He had his first grey hair __________________ at thirty.
This exercise should separate the sheep __________________ from the goats!
I'd like to get your advice __________________ about this exercise.
